snippet: Bucks readers tell how they found their financial advisers and discuss their experiences in working with a professional at a bank or a brokerage house.
abstract: Bucks readers tell how they found their financial advisers and discuss their experiences in working with a professional at a bank or a brokerage house.

headline.main: The Perils of Finding a Conflict-Free Financial Adviser
